name: Amy L.
body: Andrew showed up within an hour of my call, walked me through what failed, and had the leak fixed before school pickup. No pushy upsells - just solid work.

name: Marcus P.
body: They replaced our water heater the same day it died. Pricing was exactly what they quoted and they left the utility closet cleaner than they found it.

name: Sarah T.
body: Simple Man Plumbing is my go-to. Techs wear booties, explain every step, and even text when they're headed over. Five stars every time.

name: David K.
body: Our sump pump failed during a storm. SMP installed a new primary and backup system that night and walked me through testing it.

name: Jess R.
body: Honest, straightforward plumbers. They gave me three options for my drain issue and even showed the camera footage so I could see the problem.

name: Tony H.
body: Scheduling was easy, the tech was punctual, and pricing matched the estimate. Highly recommend for any plumbing repairs.
